name: PREempt® Concentrate Disinfectant
description: PREempt® Concentrate Disinfectant contains Accelerated Hydrogen Peroxide® (AHP®), a patented synergistic blend of commonly used ingredients that, when combined with low levels of hydrogen peroxide, significantly improves efficacy and cleaning performance. AHP is a one-step disinfectant cleaner that combines hydrogen peroxide with surfactants, wetting agents, and chelating agents. AHP is a one-of-a-kind formulation that achieves the ideal balance of fast contact time and cleaning efficacy. It also does not have a hazard classification. PREempt® Concentrate Disinfectant has a 30-second broad-spectrum non-food contact sanitizing claim, a 1-minute bactericidal claim, a 1-minute general virucide claim, and a 10-minute fungicidal claim.
